message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"next year","sentence":"明年我们去北京。","image_prompt":"A small group of people with backpacks standing together, looking excited, with the Great Wall of China in the distance. The landscape has a soft apocalypse animation style, with muted tones and gentle, dreamy atmosphere. Hints of ruined or overgrown buildings in the backdrop to suggest a subtle post-apocalyptic world, but the people are cheerful and hopeful. The sky is overcast with shafts of light breaking through.","sentence_translation":"Next year we will go to Beijing."}
